constituent: canopy, towel, limpid, sun, day, ray, small, little, human legs
heisigStory: A large towel stretched overhead with only a few of the sun's rays breaking through represents a canopy over one's bed.
koohiiStory1: A canopy is a towel to block the suns rays.
koohiiStory2: From the Hitch-Hiker´s Guide to the Universe: A towel is useful, among other things, as a canopy to keep out the sun´s rays from your face while napping.
myStory: chữ Hoảng. phông bạt che nắng. miếng vải che tia nắng mặt trời. khăn + sạch sẽ
